TopicTitle: Grand tour of Jool! (not bop, sadly)

Articles.Content:
Hello, and here is my mission:

I was sending a probe ISA mapsat to map laythe. I forgot the ASAS, so i was flying "by the seat of my pants" I got to jool, uneventfully. And, after course corections, I made it to laythe. After that, I had already disengaged my protractor, so I was stuck there basically. But, I had finished mapping laythe to my needs, (first 45 degrees inclination, then 0) so I attempted to get to vall manually. Amazingly, I was able to get a vall encounter, with no knowolage how to get there in the first place! I just guesed

After that, I also made it to tylo! I then even tryed to get to bop, but its SOI is small, and my protractor was gona, so I never made it, but, I managed to get some great views!

Pics up in a min.

HERE ARE THE PICS

<iframe class="imgur-album" width="100%" height="550" frameborder="0" src="http://imgur.com/a/67HhZ/embed"></iframe>

Edited October 10, 2012 by The Destroyer
Nice. I too love Laythe. I really wish they added more moons with atmospheres. That would make my day
